attributes.action: Bring back Capital and Corporal Punishment
attributes.additional_details:
Many people believe that capital punishment is wrong as there has been cases in the past where people were sentenced to death when they had not committed the crime.

With DNA testing etc and techniques that did not exist years ago, we can now prove a persons guilt beyond dispute thus resulting in an end to wrongful death sentences.

We support the re-introduction of Capital Punishment by means of hanging or lethal injection, Corporal Punishment by means of the birch and chain gangs.
attributes.background:
After the success of the Brexit vote we are on the way to getting our great Country back.

Now let's really show terrorists, sex offenders, murderers etc that we are finished with Europes wishy washy slap on the wrist style of punishment and let's fight crime the old way.

rejection.details:
There are already two petition which between them cover both actions that you are calling for in this petition. You might want to consider supporting these petitions

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126639
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/155351
